title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
introduction: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a branch of computer science that aims to create machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.
details: AI encompasses various subfields, including machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and robotics. It finds applications in autonomous vehicles, virtual assistants, recommendation systems, and more. Learning about AI involves understanding different AI techniques, neural networks, and the ethical implications of AI deployment.
